mapper.insert: insert into staff (SId, SName, SPassword, SEmail, SPhone, SSex, SBirthday, SEnter, SMark, SAddress, SAvator) values (#{sid}, #{sname}, #{spassword}, #{semail}, #{sphone}, #{ssex}, #{sbirthday}, #{senter}, #{smark}, #{saddress}, #{savator})
mapper.update: update staff set SName = #{sname}, SPassword = #{spassword}, SEmail = #{semail}, SPhone = #{sphone}, SSex = #{ssex}, SBirthday = #{sbirthday}, SEnter = #{senter}, SMark = #{smark}, SAddress = #{saddress}, SAvator = #{savator} where SId = #{sid}
mapper.select: select SId, SName, SPassword, SEmail, SPhone, SSex, SBirthday, SEnter, SMark, SAddress, SAvator from staff where SId = #{sid}
select SId, SName, SPassword, SEmail, SPhone, SSex, SBirthday, SEnter, SMark, SAddress, SAvator from staff where SName = #{sname} AND SPassword=#{spassword}
select SId, SName, SPassword, SEmail, SPhone, SSex, SBirthday, SEnter, SMark, SAddress, SAvator from staff
